on the tip of your tongue.word: on the tip of your tongue
on the tip of your tongue.translation[0]: if something is on the tip of your tongue, you really want to say it, but then you decide not to
It was on the tip of my tongue to say, ‘I’d rather have dinner with a snake.’
if a word, name etc is on the tip of your tongue, you know it but cannot remember it
What is her name? It’s on the tip of my tongue. Joan. Joan Simpson. That’s it!
